surname San

Tripitaka (602-664), Tang dynasty Buddhist monk and translator who traveled to India 629-645/same as 玄奘
Tripitaka (602-664), Tang dynasty Buddhist monk and translator who traveled to India 629-645/same as 玄奘

sentences.english: With his feet on the mundane earth, Tripitaka was stunned.
sentences.chinese: 三藏脚踏了凡地，自觉心惊。

sentences.english: After eighty adventurous experiences, Tang Sanzang finally got the real Buddhist scripture.
sentences.chinese: 唐三藏历经九九八十一难终于取得了真经。

sentences.english: This very short teaching contains the essence of all the Tripitaka and Vajrayana.
sentences.chinese: 这个极短的教法涵盖了全部三藏教法与金刚乘的精华。

sentences.english: I saw Monk Tang San Zang's head bone.
sentences.chinese: 我看到了唐三藏的头盖骨。

sentences.english: The entire Pali Tipitaka in Roman script is now available on the internet.
sentences.chinese: 目前，互联网上已有完整的罗马文拼写的巴利三藏。

sentences.english: The below map shows the route Xuanzang went to India.
sentences.chinese: 下面的地图显示当年唐三藏到天竺取经的路线。

sentences.english: It is interesting. It seems that it's Tripitaka's Curse.
sentences.chinese: 真有趣，听起来就像是三藏的紧箍咒。

sentences.english: Tripitaka is horrified by his violence and expels Monkey from the group.
sentences.chinese: 三藏是震惊，他的暴力和驱逐猴从小组。
